author: Peter Wright
content:
There has been some research that suggests that the colour of the anti-fouling may be significant.

Throwing sand into the water apparently confuses their sonar.

They attacked Robin Knox Johnson so they have no regard for celebrity.

author: Heather Hansen
content: I think they are being mischievous not malicious. Remember in the Pacific Northwest when they were wearing salmons on their heads for a while ? It passed

author: Bill Bedford
content: Is it possible that there is something on these boats, paint? lubricant? electrical/mechanical noise? which induces the orcas to attack them?
